plot outline: Sayajirao's Dhaal (Sheild) has been safeguarded by generations.Guru along with few of Sayajirao's man steals the Dhaal he manages to double cross them and kill everyone except Babban.Babban follows Guru to Goa as he is aware he will be going to make a deal out there.Sayajirao finds about the betrayal from his own man and wants to kill those involved.Babban reaches Goa and hires small time thieves Vicky,Babu,Neha and Preeti to steal the Dhaal from Guru.Sayajirao and his men manage to trace Babban in Goa.While Vicky and Babu unable to find Babban after stealing the Dhaal from Guru decide to sell it themselves with the help of a scrap dealer Sikander.
title: Uladhaal
plot: Baban steals heritage shield from his village. Sayajirao and villagers trace him to Goa where he is suppose to make the deal.

Sayajirao's Dhaal (Sheild) has been safeguarded by generations.Guru along with few of Sayajirao's man steals the Dhaal he manages to double cross them and kill everyone except Babban.Babban follows Guru to Goa as he is aware he will be going to make a deal out there.Sayajirao finds about the betrayal from his own man and wants to kill those involved.Babban reaches Goa and hires small time thieves Vicky,Babu,Neha and Preeti to steal the Dhaal from Guru.Sayajirao and his men manage to trace Babban in Goa.While Vicky and Babu unable to find Babban after stealing the Dhaal from Guru decide to sell it themselves with the help of a scrap dealer Sikander.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
